languages.text: {n}Я чувствую... касание воли Его? Неумирающий Император желает ниспослать мне откровение в сей час испытания — пусть Таро укажет мне путь.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Я чувствую... касание воли Его? Неумирающий Император желает ниспослать мне откровение в сей час испытания — пусть Таро укажет мне путь.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Do I sense... the touch of His will? The Undying Emperor wishes to bestow a revelation upon me in this trying hour. Let His Tarot show me the way.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Я чувствую... касание воли Его? Неумирающий Император желает ниспослать мне откровение в сей час испытания — пусть Таро укажет мне путь.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Do I sense... the touch of His will? The Undying Emperor wishes to bestow a revelation upon me in this trying hour. Let His Tarot show me the way.{/n}
{n}Do I hear... His whisper? O undying Emperor, what is your revelation to me in this hour of adversity? You whisper to me, and I must heed.{/n}
{n}Do I sense... the touch of His will? The Undying Emperor wishes to bestow a revelation upon me in this trying hour. Let His Tarot show me the way.{/n}
{n}Do I hear... His whisper? O undying Emperor, what is Your revelation to me in this hour of adversity? You whisper to me, and I give heed.{/n}
{n}Do I sense... the touch of His will? The Undying Emperor wishes to bestow a revelation upon me in this trying hour. Let His Tarot show me the way.{/n}
{n}Do I sense... the touch of His will? The Undying Emperor wishes to bestow a revelation upon me in this trying hour. Let His Tarot show me the way.{/n}
{n}Do I sense... the touch of His will? The Undying Emperor wishes to bestow a revelation upon me in this trying hour. Let His Tarot show me the way.{/n}
{n}Do I sense... the touch of His will? The Undying Emperor wishes to bestow a revelation upon me in this trying hour. Let His Tarot show me the way.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Spüre ich ... die Berührung Seines Willens? Der Todlose Imperator will mir in dieser schwierigen Stunde etwas offenbaren. Möge mir sein Tarot den Weg weisen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Do I sense... the touch of His will? The Undying Emperor wishes to bestow a revelation upon me in this trying hour. Let His Tarot show me the way.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Spüre ich ... die Berührung Seines Willens? Der Todlose Imperator will mir in dieser schwierigen Stunde etwas offenbaren. Möge mir sein Tarot den Weg weisen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}¿Percibo... Su roce? El Emperador Inmortal desea presentarme una revelación en estos arduos momentos. Que su Tarot me muestre el camino.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Do I sense... the touch of His will? The Undying Emperor wishes to bestow a revelation upon me in this trying hour. Let His Tarot show me the way.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}¿Percibo... Su roce? El Emperador Inmortal desea presentarme una revelación en estos arduos momentos. Que su Tarot me muestre el camino.{/n}

languages.text: {n}我が感じているこれは…主の意思か？不死の皇帝は、この試練の時に我に啓示を授けたいと願っておられる。タロットに道を示してもらおう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Do I sense... the touch of His will? The Undying Emperor wishes to bestow a revelation upon me in this trying hour. Let His Tarot show me the way.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}我が感じているこれは…主の意思か？不死の皇帝は、この試練の時に我に啓示を授けたいと願っておられる。タロットに道を示してもらおう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}我是不是感受到了……祂的意志？在这艰难的时刻，不死神皇想要赐予我启示，让祂的圣牌为我指明方向吧。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Do I sense... the touch of His will? The Undying Emperor wishes to bestow a revelation upon me in this trying hour. Let His Tarot show me the way.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}我是不是感受到了……祂的意志？在这艰难的时刻，不死神皇想要赐予我启示，让祂的圣牌为我指明方向吧。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Est-ce... le toucher de Sa volonté que je perçois ? L'Empereur Immortel a une révélation à m'accorder en ces heures sombres. Son tarot saura me guider dans les ténèbres.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Do I sense... the touch of His will? The Undying Emperor wishes to bestow a revelation upon me in this trying hour. Let His Tarot show me the way.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Est-ce... le toucher de Sa volonté que je perçois ? L'Empereur Immortel a une révélation à m'accorder en ces heures sombres. Son tarot saura me guider dans les ténèbres.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yoksa bir nebze de olsa... O'nun arzusunu mu seziyorum? Ölmeyen İmparator, bu zor saatlerde bana bir vahiy gönderme niyetinde. O'nun Tarotu bana yol göstersin.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Do I sense... the touch of His will? The Undying Emperor wishes to bestow a revelation upon me in this trying hour. Let His Tarot show me the way.{/n}
